text: David Cross (born April 4, 1964) is an American comedian and actor who is known for playing Ian Hawke in the Alvin and the Chipmunks series and for voicing Crane in Kung Fu Panda 1, 2, and 3. ==Acting== *Space Ghost: Coast to Coast – himself *Aqua Teen Hunger Force – Happy Time Harry, Burt Banana *Kung Fu Panda – Crane *Alvin and the Chipmunks – Ian Hawke *Alvin and the Chipmunks: The Squeakquel – Ian Hawke *Alvin and the Chipmunks: Chipwrecked - Ian Hawke *Small Soldiers - Irwin *Kung Fu Panda 2 - Crane *The Post Category:1964 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American voice actors Category:American television actors Category:Actors from Atlanta
title: David Cross
